MCQ: What is the role of the discriminator in a Generative Adversarial Network (GAN)?
Choices: a: To generate new content | b: To distinguish between real and generated data | c: To predict the next element in a sequence | d: To sample from the learned distribution

MCQ: Which method does a Variational Autoencoder (VAE) generative model use to produce new samples?
Choices: a: It competes with another network in order to improve the quality of generated content | b: It predicts the next element based on previous elements in a sequence | c: It samples from the learned distribution | d: None of the above

MCQ: What is not an application of Generative AI?
Choices: a: Realistic image generation | b: Code snippets generation | c: Hacking into secure databases | d: Music composition in different styles and genres

MCQ: What are some ethical concerns raised over Generative AI?
Choices: a: Ability to create misleading or harmful content | b: Ability to hack into secure systems | c: Mass replacement of human jobs | d: Both a and c

MCQ: Which Generative AI model involves predicting the next element in sequence based on preceding elements?
Choices: a: Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) | b: Variational Autoencoders (VAEs) | c: Autoregressive Models | d: None of the above
